property.display: Drift Comp/Offset Adjust non-touched Sensors on touch

option.display: Type 1 (release all touched sensors, if non-debounced touch count is > max_touched_sensors)
Type 2 (release all touched sensors, if debounced touch count is > max_touched_sensors)
Type 3 (release all touched sensors, if (current debounced sensors - previously debounced sensors) > max_touched_sensors)

constraint.display: Name must be number greater than 0

Name must be number greater than 0

constraint.display: Name must be number greater than 0
